## Web3sdkioSDKProvider variable

A basic wrapper around the Web3sdkio SDK.

You can use this in order to be able to pass a provider &amp; signer directly to the SDK.

**Signature:**

```typescript
Web3sdkioSDKProvider: ComponentWithChildren<Web3sdkioSDKProviderProps>;
```

## Remarks

Utilizing this provider will mean hooks for wallet management are not available, if you need those please use the [Web3sdkioProvider](./react.web3sdkioprovider.md) instead.
